The Sun that gives us the life will die sooner or later. And with it all the Solar System, including the Earth.

In a distant future the life in the Earth will be impossible, and we cannot do anything to avoid it. The Sun is turning into an irresistible monster for our planet. According to the scientists, the only unique solution is to go to other places of the space to avoid the extinction of our species. But where?

The idea is to create a new home for human in Mars, which is the only planet that assembles conditions for life. There would be necessary to transform this hostile planet into an inhabitable world.

An amazing plan that, nevertheless, does not remove us from the danger. The increase of the Sol and its warming will do life in Mars be impossible. And we will continue escaping of the Sun in search of new worlds to which we will have to adapt.
